values:
this period sucks...but anyway, my life is finally going up hill...i mean, i have an awesome boyfriend, friends that actually give a damn, nad my parents are letting me go out more. but it figures that once my life starts to go better, all my friends lives are sucking. lauren has been my best friend for god knows how long and she told me today that her mom won't let her eat anything. i felt like crying my eyes out today when she told me that. i mean, she tortures herself like i used to...she doesnt need that too. she's an awesome person and i love her to death. i'd do anything for her. she's grounded too, otherwise she'd be at my house eating with me. i hate to see her hurting like this.
And lindsay...she's not dealing with the pressures of high school very well. I've always known her to be a strong person, but i guess she's just finally reached that point to where all the stress is getting to her. i try to be there for her and she knows that. she knows how much i love her and that i'm always here for her if she needs to talk. 
it just makes me really upset to see my friends hurting like this, when i'm finally happy, theyre all really upset. it kills me. idk...maybe i care too much. but my friends are all i have. i'm nothing without my friends. idk...i guess i'll go. bye
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/16851.html

andrew is so kickass man. i love him. he's a really good friend. he mite be comin over after school 2morrow so me, him, jimmy, ian, possibly brennen, and kimmy can all chill. we'll prolly go find some innocent people at the park to torture. lol. that should be fun. so evil. anyway...school's goin good. i made really cool friends. theyre all freaks, just like me! lol. i cant wait till my baby moves here so he can join us. :-D well i gues i'll go...nuttin else to say rite now. bye peoples...love ya! <3
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/16516.html

jenn is so freakin pathetic. i think she needs to come up with new insults that i havent heard a million times before. and if you think that i'm going to believe anything about tom and jesse, you're wrong. youre pathetic and immature. i think you and jesse both need to get your own boyfriends so you can stop your pathetic little attempts at getting mine b/c it's never gunna happen. my baby wouldnt risk catching anything that you might have, because everybody knows that you sleep around npr. i think you should take a class on how to pronounce the name "JHERIKA"...if you say i'm stupid,then i must be a genius compared to you. its pretty funny how you try to get tom to fuck jesse when i dont see how anybody would wanna fuck that giant blob of fat you call a female. and if you think i have fucked up hair, you should look in the miror. at least mine isnt all one big dead frizzball. you're a pathetic excuse for a human jenn, and i will personally make sure that you rot in hell. have fun catching STD's.

http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/15975.html

Have you ever felt like a complete control freak with your b/gf and then finally realized it and try to change it to help your b/gf even tho it's killing you??? i feel like that now...i realized yesterday how much of a control freak i was, so i'm trying to change that so i can make tom happy...even tho i'm being torn up inside. we were talkin about doin somethin this weekend for his b-day...but i asked him if he talked to his mom about it and he said that his dad MIGHT need him to work...but he'll be making like 4-500 dollars for it so he can finally buy his guitar. it really bummed me out cuz this is the 2nd weekend in a row that has been fucked up, but i want him to work so he can be happy and get his guitar...but i want him to come see me so i can be happy. so i told him to go ahead and work even tho i kno i'm gunna get completely bummed out, but i dont want him to sacrifice somethin he really wants just for me. UGH! idk anymore. i just want him to be happy. as long as he's happy, then i'll be happy (ok, so i just completely lied to myself there, but i'm tryin hard to make myself believe that so maybe i won't feel so bad anymore.) idk...if anyone has any advice PLEASE PLEASE let me kno b4 i go insane and tear myself apart.
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/15829.html

logey is a really cool guy. it seems like i can talk to him about anything and he's really open about stuff. i like that. and he's ALWAYS here. which is really cool. i like talking to him. i hope we get to chill someday soon!!!!! love ya lots logey!!! muahz! <3
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/15385.html

well...i had a good weekend...tom came over saturday and spent the nite at my house :-D
we basically sat around the whole time and did absolutely nothing except cuddle. i love that. he really is the best thing thats ever happened to me. i'm so happy that he's with me. when vinny and i dropped him off at his house, i went up to his appartment like i always do. i had been telling him for a week that i wanted a shirt or something of his that i could wear. well, when i walked him upstairs, we went in his room, and he opened his boxer drawer and pulled out a pair of spongebob boxers and handed them to me. :-D i told him i was gunna go home and put them on and he's like..."wait a minute...you're gunna wear my boxers?!?!?!" i'm like yup. lol. then i had to go :-( but i did what i told him i was goin to...i came home and put on his boxers and my slipknot shirt. (btw baby...your boxers are REALLY comfy!!!:-D) i miss him already and idk if i'm gunna get to see him again b4 school starts. :-(...oh well. i guess we'll see what happens. i love you baby!! muahz! *BOUNCY BOUNCY BOUNCY* lol
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/15238.html

do you ever get the feeling like youre flaws are being judged by the world? i get that feeling all the time...i think it's because the world has put this pressure on us...saying how we need to be supermodel skinny with no boobs or butt to be considered pretty...it's bullshit. i mean i always get the feeling that the reason y i've been rejected so many times in the past is b/c i'm not a toothpick. it makes me sick to think that i can't be accepted for who i am anymore...and that it all depends on what the scale says. cuz i kno i'm not the skinniest person in the world, but i'm nowhere near being over weight. just b/c i have a little bit of a buldge shouldnt mean anything as long as i have a good personality and i am someone you can get along with. am i rite? idk...maybe i just let things get to me when they shouldn't...i'm just tired of being judged b/c of my wieght...oh well...later days

hey...whats up ppl?!?!? been busy. my cousins spent 3 days over at my aunts with me. we've been chillin wit these really cool guys that live down the street. i went shoppin 2day and got some new clothes...yay! 2morrow my aunt is drivin my eldest cousin to connecticut to see her bf. me and my other cous r goin wit them...i won't b home till like after 6 and we're leavin at 8. grrr...so busy. oh well, at least i got some cool clothes outta the deal. lol. anyway...i'll be home a week from 2morrow. :-( :-) i'm sad that i'm leavin, but i'll be happy 2 get home. oh wel...jay is comin 2 pick me up and bring me to the park so we can play basketball. 
peace out
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/12620.html
i really think i should get on some sort of medication for my bi polar...i've been getting worse and worse lately, and i'm afraid of what's gunna happen. but w/e. later
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/12343.html

today my aunt took me, my cousin, and my 2nd cousin to the carnival...it was soo much fun. me and gabrielle (my 2nd cousin) went on one of those drop zone thingies...it went up 8 stories and as soon as you got up there, it dropped you...with no warning. we were shaking like leaves when we got off. we were still shaking 20 minutes later! my cousin started callin us pansey's b/c of it...so we're like "at least we were brave enuff 2 go on, you chicken!" after that we went on the swings, the bumper cars (me and gabby ganged up on my cousin b/c it was his birthday. lol), and this ride that swung you all around...it was fun. after the carnival, we went 2 blockbuster and rented shrek 2 for ps2. every1, including my aunt, sat there and played that game for like 4 hours. that game is so awesome. but then my aunt had 2 go to the shop and help my uncle with somethin, so the rest of us played simpsons clue. gabby won. then we had 2 bring them home...2morrow is my cousin's b-day party, so i won't be on at all 2morrow. idk if i'll b on the day after that or not...so don't be mad if i don't update. 

the carnival reminded me of the day i met tom and i realized exactly how important he is to me and how much i miss him...:*( i wish he was here. 

but anyway...i gtg...my aunt just wenty 2 go get our pizza. peace out
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/12239.html

Lovesick 
Look in the mirror. Is there a great big goofy grin on your face? Thought so. You're in love, and with good reason. Your guy spoils you with affection, accepts your faults as well as your strengths and values your opinion. Take these few tips for keeping your flower in bloom: Maintain your independence. Joining lips with your guy is nice; joining identities with him is not. Don't neglect your gal pals. And most important, relish this wonderful thing you're found!
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/11975.html

i got in2 an arguament with tm 2day about something stupid that he did last nite...the fact that we were arguing made my stomach turn. we haven't had an argument since my birthday. but i guess it's ok that we fought b/c we're over it now and i feel a little bit closer to him. and the fact that we can both be civilized and talk things out and get over it instead of holding grudges makes me feel a lot better about our relatationship. i mean, i felt great about it before, but now i feel even better than that. i hate fighting with him, but i guess, in the long run, each fight brings us closer 2gether. i mean, he couldn't come to my birthday party b/c of something stupid, and i was pissed, so we fought and i broke up with him a couple days after that...not 4 that reason, but still. and then i went out with this other guy and it made me realize how much i really do love him and how much i missed him. so in the long run, that fight helped us out too, ya kno? idk...i guesss it all depends on how you look at things. i mean, if you look at the negative, thats what the outcome of the situation will turn out to be...but if you look at the positive, than the outcome of the situation will most likely be positive. but people have diffrent perspectives of things, so i guess that wouldn't apply to everyone. i think it makes sense tho. 

in other news, i went tanning on the beach with my aunt 2day. my face is pink, but my body is nice and tan...yay! she got a nice tan, too. we were out there for 2 1/2 hours and we talked the whole time. we talked about everything, from smoking to family problems, even sex...it wa awesome...it felt good to be able to talk to her and now i kno that i really can talk 2 her about EVERYTHING. 

by the end of the day, i was ready to fall asleep...even tho i'll prolly be up till 1a.m. like i was last nite. lol. 

guess thats all for now...peace out!
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/11580.html

You have a Lost Soul. No one is really sure what
that can always mean, because it can be defined
in many ways. As Legend goes, lost souls were
the spirits of passed away people who are
neither in heaven nor hell. They walk the
earth, brooding mysteriously, always appearing
when you expect it least. So hence, if you have
a Lost Soul, then you are probably very
insecure and shy. Stuck in your own little box,
you watch the world fly by as a loner. You dont
know your place. You seemingly dont have a
place in society or an interest. You are a very
capricious person, and are confused and
frustrated about where you belong. You crave
for the sense and feeling of home-but have not
obtained it yet.

What Kind of SOUL do you posses? (For Girls only) Incredible Anime Pictures!

i feel like crap...i miss my baby...he misses me 2...i went 2 go get my belly button peirced 2day...but i didn't have enuff $...i was pissed. so i guess i have 2 wait till i go home 2 get it done...oh well. we also went to the mall to buy b-day presents 4 my cousin, Joey...his b-day is this friday, so we're all goin 2 the carnival. it's gunna remind me of the day i met tom tho, so i mite get somewhat depressed. but i'll still try my best 2 have fun. 2morrow we're going bike riding thru ocean county park (i was born in ocean county) and we're gunna have a picnic lunch. the weather here is awesome! it's so cool outside that we can have all the doors and windows open and shut the air off. it's great...much better than florida...i just wish tom was here to enjoy it with me. he will be next year tho...so we'll have to take him 2 six flags and the water park across the street from there. then we'll have to take him 2 toms river (the part of ocean county where i was born and lived for 7 years of my life) and show him my old house and the hospital where i was born. i can't wait! but anyway, i gtg...my aunt and uncle r tryin 2 sleep, so i don't wanna keep them up with the sound of my fingers on the keyboard. i'll update again 2morrow...peace
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/10887.html
yay...i got 2 jersey w/out the plane crashin! i miss tom sooooo much! it's not fair! i want my baby! waaaaaa!!!
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/10576.html

well, only 3 more hours till i leave for the airport...i'm so depressed...tom is too...he really doesn't want me 2 go...he's probably gunna be the person that misses me the most...i kno he's gunna b the person that i miss the most. *sighs* it's never been this hard on me 2 leave...i guess i better go finish packin...peace
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/10456.html

well, it's almost time for me 2 leave florida...it's so depressing...i'm gunna miss every1 soooo much...but i'm gunna miss tom the most...he's my everything...my other half. it's kinda like i'm being torn in half...one half of me is staying in florida, and the other half will be on a plane to jersey at 6:45 2morrow nite. :*( i'm gunna miss him soooo much...and if he doesn't call me 2morrow 2 say goodbye,i'll be so depressed. i kno it's hard 4 him 2 say goodbye 2 me, but i won't be able to stop worrying about everything if i don't get 2 say i love him 1 more time b4 i go...just in case something goes wrong. i don't wanna think like that, but i'm always worrying about shit like that. idk...i don't kno when i'll b able 2 update again...hopefully soon so i can let you all kno that i got there ok. but i guess i better go finish packing...:*( I'LL MISS YOU GUYS!!!!! ttyl. peace out...MMFWKL
http://toxic-17.livejournal.com/10236.html
I'm so fuckin tired of updating this damn thing when no1 reads it! fuck it! i just won't update anymore unless i have something important 2 say...w/e...

concious to sit on a guys lap b/c i always felt like i would crush them. but i don't feel that way with tom. he makes me feel like the most beautiful person in the world. he's constantly telling me that. i have a very low self-esteam, but ever since i met tom, that level has risen. he never lates me forget that i'm perfect to him and i'm beautiful inside and out. but yeah, anyway, back to the story. after we got done with uno, mom wanted us 2 play trivial persuit. tom didnt really wanna play, so me n tom just went inside. i guess since we didn't play that mom and pat decided not to play at all. so pat followed us inside and woke his dad up by burping tooo loud. (before we came inside pat and tom had a burping contest. it was soo gross. tom kicked ass tho.lol thats my baby.) so we all just decided 2 go sit outside. me n tom almost broke a chair. lmao. the chair wasn't sturdy enuf to hold us both, especially since i kept slipping off his lap and had 2 keep moving to get back up. so we got a sturdier chair and we all just sat out there talkin, still feeling high and wasted from being over tired. lol. then mom said we all had 2 go inside and get some sleep. (i was wearing a white shirt with black pants) so i went out there and tom gave me this look like i did somethin wrong. i'm like what? i didnt do anything! but i kinda figured that it was b/c i was wearin my bathin suit top.lol. so he was sittin there kissin my neck while i was on his lap playin the game. then he started sayin it was really hot. so i asked him if he wanted me 2 get up. he's like no. it won't really help anything. it'll just make me get up and go inside. so we started playin again and i got hot so i went inside and put shorts on. then he gave me even more of a look. lol. so we were almost done with the game and it got waaaaay too hot so i quit and me n tom went inside and...you guessed it...cuddled on my couch again. we were sittin there watchin ed edd and eddy(best cartoon ever!!!) and talkin about who reminds us of which caracter. he said i'm a mixture of sara (her mouth and attitude) and naz (every1 wants her). he said he'd b edd and kyle would b ed and chris would b eddy. lmao. but if it were just me, him, and chris, i'd b edd, he'd be ed, and chris would still be eddy. lol. then mom came in and put on cheech and chong. (aka chris and him.) that was great, even tho i didn't see too much of it cuz i was falling asleep on his chest. lol. i woke up at one point and saw him and pat like mouthing stuff 2 eachother and then tom pointed at me. i'm like what? tom said, "pat was givin me the sign that some1 was sleepin, so i pointed at you 2 c if you were." (he couldn't see my face the way we were layin) lol. i was fallin in and out of sleep for about an hour. then we got up and went back outside 4 a little bit. then we went back inside and cuddled there till 9 just talking and kissing. it was great. you may think it'slame because we don't have much of a physical relationship, but that doesn't matter to us...(or to me anyway. lol) all that matters to me is the way he makes me feel. he treats me like a queen. no guy has ever treated me that way before. it feels great. i actually feel loved. i've never felt this way about anyone before. he's the best guy i could've asked for. but back to the story (again). we walked up to the park at 9 to go find vinny so he could give him a ride home. we sat in the car and basically talked and made out the whole time. then we got 2 his building and i walked him up 2 his apartment to say hi 2 his parents. i was there 4 like 15 minutes talking to them and then tom told them that i had 2 go. so he walked me back out 2 the car and we were kissin in the parking lot and i told him i only had 8 days left until i had 2 leave and he squeezed me and told me that he won't let me go. lol. i kno he's gunna miss me and i'm gunna miss him soooo much. i won't b able to stop thinkin about him. he told me that he feels like we're married b/c we both have rings on our ring fingers and every time we went to kiss while he was here, my brother and sister would go EWWWWWWW!!! lol. when i went to bed last nite i felt all weird and naked b/c i wasn't in his arms. i can't wait to leave so i can get back and be in his arms again...i love him more than anything in the world. he means everything to me. and i kno that i mean everything to him and that he would do anything for me. i mean, he told me that he hasn't had a drink in 3 weeks b/c i told him that i hate drinking and i shared some of my experiences with him. so that means a lot to me. but i miss him already. lol. i gtg. peace out. i wrote this poem a couple days ago...i'll give everybody one guess on who it's about...it's called These Four Walls

I feel so trapped on the inside
with no idea of what goes on
outside these four walls.
I stare at them every day
with no hope of being rescued.
I have no idea of what the world is like,
and it's all your fault.
You're the one who keeps me here
for any little reason you find.
You love to torture me
and tear apart my insides.
You love to hear my screams and cries,
and the fact that you make my eyes bleed.
You kno I can't do anything to you,
so self mutilation is my only choice.
Every fresh wound drips with blood
from all the pain you've put me thru.
All the yelling and scraeming...
Your voice rings in my head day and night, 
telling me that I can't do anything right 
and how all I am is a big mistake.
I think it's time I pay you back.
As I take this knife
and slice open your chest, 
you scream in pain,
and I just laugh...
I  rip out your heart
and squeeze it full of pain 
just like you've done to me for so many years.
I watch you bleed,
and laugh at the thought of how pathetic you really are.
You never knew what was coming to you...
Now you're gone
and I can finally see
what the world is like,
outside these four walls.


lemme kno what you think of it...
